DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess Roux-en-Y gastric bypass ( RYGP ) impact energy nutrient ' intake , energy expenditure , nutritional status obese patient . It try quantitate energy protein balance RYGP , identify RYGP effect intake various common dietary protein source 16 female patient BMI > 40 kg/m2 wait list bariatric surgery include . The following measurement perform , 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 , 36 month RYGP - body weight - body composition ( bio impedancemetry ) - basal metabolic rate ( open circuit indirect calorimetry ) - 24-hour urinary urea excretion - fasting blood chemistry - energy macronutrient 's intake ( 3-day dietary recall )
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Nutritional Status After Gastric Bypass Surgery
DOC.criteria: age 1865 year gender : female body mass index > 35 kg/m2 GI tract diseases endocrine disease
